VisionScript

  • Reference
  • Syntax
  • GitHub

ReadQR[]

Read a QR code and return the text associated with the QR code.

Syntax

ReadQR[]

Examples

The following example loads an image, detects a QR code, and displays the text associated with the QR code.

Load["./photo1.jpg"]
ReadQR[]
Say[]
